; File Types:
;  py: .py and .pyc files installed.
;  pyc: .pyc files only installed.
;
;
[System Files]
; Files installed into the SYSTEM directory
system=%python_ce_home%\pcbuild\ce\Python15.dll
system=%python_ce_home%\pcbuild\ce\Python.exe
pyd=..\..\Win32\Build\ce\pywintypes15.dll

[Extension Files]
; Files installed into the Dlls directory
; The CE specific ones
pyd=..\Build\ce\*.pyd
; The common win32 ones
pyd=..\..\Win32\Build\ce\*.pyd

[Script Files]
; Files installed into the Scripts
py=..\Scripts\*.py

[Library Files]
; Files installed into the lib directory

pyc=..\Lib\*.py

; The Python library - only some of it, hence we specify each file.
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\StringIO.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\base64.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\code.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\codeop.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\copy.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\copy_reg.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\exceptions.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\ftplib.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\getopt.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\httplib.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\keyword.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\linecache.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\mimetools.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\ntpath.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\os.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\pickle.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\re.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\regsub.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\rfc822.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\site.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\smtplib.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\stat.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\string.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\tempfile.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\threading.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\traceback.py
pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\types.py

pyc=%python_ce_home%\lib\plat-win\socket.py
